short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See your YNAB budget on the webpages where it will help you the most.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Check Out My Budget puts the power back into your hands by bringing your well thought out and organized budget with you as you shop and spend money online. Don't create your budget and forget about it. Instead let Check Out My Budget help you achieve your goals!

New functionality allows you to use this extension on any website, not just the popular ones! You can now show your relevant YNAB budget categories while paying your piano teacher or your when grocery shopping online.

Click the extension icon in Chrome to safely connect your YNAB account and setup which budget categories are visible to you on the current website. From that point on, when you visit that website, you will see an up to date and accurate picture of your budget so you can decide if that silly hat you are looking at is okay to buy while staying within your planned Budget.
